name: psr1bascl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2))))

stmt.origin: syl6eleq(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2)), c1, wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(1o[mPwSer]c2)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ c1 =(Base `(1o[mPwSer]c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(1o[mPwSer]c2)))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ c1)
⊣ c1 =(Base `(1o[mPwSer]c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2)))

stmt.origin: psr1bas2(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c2), c3, c2)

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cps1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmps, c2), co(c1o, cmps, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cps1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmps, c2), co(c1o, cmps, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(1o[mPwSer]c2)))
⊣ c3 =(PwSer1 ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (1o[mPwSer]c2)=(1o[mPwSer]c2)

body.origin: |- wceq(co(c1o, cmps, c2), co(c1o, cmps, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c2))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cps1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(1o[mPwSer]c2)))
⊣ c3 =(PwSer1 ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

comment: A univariate power series is a multivariate power series on one index. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Mar-2015.)
